title: Men's 1000 m - Speed Skating Innsbruck 1976 Winter Olympics
table: {"0":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 1000 m 1976","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":null,"6":null,"7":null,"8":"4.","9":"5.","10":"6.","11":"7.","12":"8.","13":"9.","14":"10.","15":"11.","16":"12.","17":"13.","18":"14.","19":"15.","20":"16.","21":"17.","22":"18.","23":"19.","24":"20.","25":"21.","26":"22.","27":"23.","28":"24.","29":"25.","30":"26.","31":"27.","32":"28.","33":"29.","34":"30.","35":"31.","36":null,"37":null,"38":"Men's 1000 m - Speed Skating - Innsbruck 1976 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes). Skaters had to change lanes in the back straightaway of each lap in order to skate an equal distance. The skater on the outer lane had the right of way and the skater leaving the inner lane should avoid collision. The Olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race. Event facts: Men's 1000 m competition was held at the Olympiaeisschnelllaufbahn and 31 athletes participated in the event.","39":null,"40":"These results for Men's 1000 m - Innsbruck 1976 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","41":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 1000 m 1976","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Peter Mueller","6":"J\u00f8rn Didriksen","7":"Valery Muratov","8":"Aleksandr Safronov","9":"Hans van Helden","10":"Gaetan Boucher","11":"Mats Wallberg","12":"Pertti Niittyll\u00e4","13":"Horst Freese","14":"Klaus Wunderlich","15":"Colin Coates","16":"Daniel Immerfall","17":"Johan Granath","18":"Bruno Toniolli","19":"Lee Young-ha","20":"Terje Andersen","21":"Emmanuel Michon","22":"Piet Kleine","23":"Masaki Suzuki","24":"Harald \u00d6hme","25":"Archibald Marshall","26":"Kai Arne Stenshjemmet","27":"Thomas Overend","28":"Mikio Oyama","29":"Berend Schabus","30":"Floriano Martello","31":"Richard Tourne","32":"Daniel Carroll","33":"Andrey Malikov","34":"Norio Hirate","35":"Bernt Jansson","36":null,"37":null,"38":"Men's 1000 m - Speed Skating - Innsbruck 1976 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes).
